item.title: Minimap and miniasm: fast mapping and de novo assembly for noisy long sequences
item.description: Summary Algorithm explained A-1. MinimizerSketch(s, w, k) M = set() for i to |s| - w - k + 1 do m = 'inf' for j = 0 to w - 1 do u, v = hash( ) A-2. InvertibleHash(x, p) A-3. Index(T, w, k) A-4. Map(H, q, w, k, e)
